mapper.update: INSERT INTO S_WF_DISPUTEHELPER (RTLID, ACPTCHNLID, CALLID, STAFFID, DEPTID, ACPTNUM, BRANDNUM, GROUPNM, GROUPADDR, BIZCNTT, ACPTUSERNAME, FSTCONCTELNUM1, CONCADDR, CUSTSTARGRDCD, FULLNAME, SRTYPEID, ACPTMODECD, CRTTYPE, CUSTTYPECD, PROVCODE, TENANTID, VERNO, CHANNELCODE, CHANNELSYSCODE, CMPLNUPGDFLAG, URGNTEXTENTCD, ACPTTIME, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5) VALUES ( #{rtlId}, #{acptChnlId}, #{callId}, #{staffId}, #{deptId}, #{acptNum}, #{brandNum}, #{groupNm}, #{groupAddr}, #{bizCntt}, #{acptUserName}, #{fstConcTelnum1}, #{concAddr}, #{custStargrdCd}, #{fullName}, #{srTypeId}, #{acptModeCd}, #{crtType}, #{custTypeCd}, #{provCode}, #{tenantId}, #{verno}, #{channelCode}, #{channelSysCode}, #{cmplnUpgdFlag}, #{urgntExtentCd}, now(), #{ext1}, #{ext2}, #{ext3}, #{ext4}, #{ext5})
